plot outline: The Plot revolves around the life of Upendran played by John Brittas who falls in love with and wishes to marry a bar dancer, played by Iniya. The lives of NRI Malayalees are portrayed by the other characters in the movie, depicting their daily struggles.
title: Vellivelichathil
plot: The Plot revolves around the life of Upendran played by John Brittas who falls in love with and wishes to marry a bar dancer, played by Iniya. The lives of NRI Malayalees are portrayed by the other characters in the movie, depicting their daily struggles.
